class SXF_ElemRfCavityHash : public SXF_ElemBucketHash

Types

Interface

Public Members
SXF_ElemRfCavityHash()
virtual int index(const char* name) const

Description

The ElemRfCavityHash class implements a rf cavity bucket hash. SXF Rf Cavity attribute keys are "volt", "lag", "harmon", "shunt", and "tfill".

Member Description

enum Attributes

SXF_ElemRfCavityHash()

Constructor.

virtual int index(const char* name) const

Map an attribute key to its enum value. Return a corresponding enum value or -1.
